00049 //
00050 // FieldListDiskBlockReader.hpp
00051 //
00052 // 10 February 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_KEYFILEFIELDLISTDISKBLOCKREADER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_KEYFILEFIELDLISTDISKBLOCKREADER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/Extent.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/FieldListDiskBlockWriter.hpp"
00060 
00061 class FieldListDiskBlockReader {
00062 private:
00063   Extent _extent;
00064   const char* _current;
00065   const char* _block;
00066   int _extentCount;
00067   int _document;
00068   int _endByte;
00069   bool _numeric;
00070   INT64 _number;
00071 
00072 public:
00073   void setBlock( const char* block ) {
00074     _block = block;
00075     _current = block;
00076     _document = 0;
00077     _extentCount = 0;
00078     _extent.begin = 0;
00079     _extent.end = 0;
00080     _number = 0;
00081 
00082     int endAndNumeric = * (int*) ( _block + INDRI_FIELDLIST_BLOCKSIZE - 2*sizeof(int) );
00083     _numeric = (endAndNumeric & 0x80000000) ? true : false;
00084     _endByte = endAndNumeric & 0x7fffffff;
00085   }
00086 
00087   int lastDocument() {
00088     return * (int*) ( _block + INDRI_FIELDLIST_BLOCKSIZE - sizeof(int) );
00089   }
00090 
00091   bool next() {
00092     if( ! _extentCount ) {
00093       if( !hasMore() )
00094         return false;
00095 
00096       int documentDelta;
00097 
00098       _current = RVLCompress::decompress_int( _current, documentDelta );
00099       _current = RVLCompress::decompress_int( _current, _extentCount );
00100       _document += documentDelta;
00101     
00102       _extent.begin = 0;
00103       _extent.end = 0;
00104     }
00105 
00106     int beginDelta;
00107     int endDelta;
00108 
00109     _current = RVLCompress::decompress_int( _current, beginDelta );
00110     _current = RVLCompress::decompress_int( _current, endDelta );
00111 
00112     if( _numeric ) {
00113       _current = RVLCompress::decompress_longlong( _current, _number );
00114 
00115       if( _number & 1 ) {
00116         // number is negative
00117         _number = -((_number + 1) / 2);
00118       } else {
00119         // number is positive
00120         _number = _number / 2;
00121       }
00122     }
00123 
00124     assert( _current < _block + INDRI_FIELDLIST_BLOCKSIZE );
00125 
00126     _extentCount--;
00127     _extent.begin = _extent.end + beginDelta;
00128     _extent.end = _extent.begin + endDelta;
00129     return true;
00130   }
00131 
00132   int document() const {
00133     return _document;
00134   }
00135 
00136   INT64 number() const {
00137     return _number;
00138   }
00139 
00140   const Extent& extent() const {
00141     return _extent;
00142   }
00143 
00144   bool hasMore() {
00145     return _endByte > _current - _block;
00146   }
00147 };
00148 
00149 #endif // INDRI_FIELDLISTDISKBLOCKREADER_HPP
Generated on Tue Nov 16 15:17:20 2004 for INDRI by 1.2.16
